subtitle: "*Deferred Acceptance with Marginal Rate of Substitution*"
description: "This module is a python implementation of the deferred acceptance procedure (DAP) developed by Gale and Shapley (1962). The algorithm computes an applicant-optimal assignment based on the data for the agents' characteristics and the marginal rate of substitution (MRS) between the characteristics of their counterparts."
